select.name: tblBuyOrder_quote_tblBuyApplication
select.defineSQL: select tblBuyApplication.id f1, tblBuyApplication.BillDate f2, tblBuyApplication.BillNo f3, tblDepartment.DeptFullName f4, tblEmployee.EmpFullName f5, tblGoods.GoodsNumber f6, tblGoods.GoodsFullName f7, tblGoods.GoodsSpec f8, tblGoods.GoodsFullNamePYM f9, tblBuyApplicationDet.Qty f10, tblBuyApplicationDet.NoOrderQty f11 from tblBuyApplication left join tblEmployee on tblEmployee.id=tblBuyApplication.EmployeeID left join tblDepartment on tblDepartment.classCode=tblBuyApplication.DepartmentCode left join tblBuyApplicationDet on (tblBuyApplication.id=tblBuyApplicationDet.f_ref and tblBuyApplicationDet.id=(select top 1 a.id from tblBuyApplicationDet a where a.f_ref=tblBuyApplication.id and a.GoodsCode in (select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and tblGoods.GoodsNumber like '%@condition:tblGoods.GoodsNumber%' and tblGoods.GoodsFullName like '%@condition:tblGoods.GoodsFullName%' and tblGoods.GoodsSpec like '@condition:tblGoods.GoodsSpec%') order by NoOrderQty desc)) left join tblGoods on tblGoods.classCode=tblBuyApplicationDet.GoodsCode
select.remark: 采购订单引用采购申请
